about.name: Harish Mohan
summary: Hi, this is Harish Mohan. I'm a CS Grad Student at the Viterbi School of Engineering, USC. I graduate in May 2020. I have a strong CS foundation, thanks to my undergrad at MIT, Anna University.

I'm keen on delivering scalable, automated and optimized solutions for problems evolving over time. I have some research experience pertaining to Deep learning at IIT Madras and Knowledge graphs at ISI USC. I also have industry experience working with Real-time systems at CTDT, Anna University, and Scalable backend systems at RDS Platform, AWS.

Through my carefully selected coursework and projects, I have developed a significant level of expertise in Software development. I'm passionate about Machine Learning, Data Mining, Data Engineering, Artificial intelligence and Software development. At my leisure, I like to explore trending technologies, competitive programming and read machine learning articles.

education.degree: Master of Science (M.S) in Computer Science
Bachelor of Engineering (B.E) in Computer Science & Engineering

experience.title: SDE Database Intern
details: Increased the number of database connections handled by instances up to 200% by investigating and harnessing the capabilities of asynchronous Jasync-SQL driver, Goroutines and Kotlin Co-routines.
Researched the features, use cases of container orchestration techniques such as EKS, ECS Fargate and devised an orchestration scheme to containerize, deploy, manage and monitor native applications.

experience.title: Graduate Researcher
details: Programmed Logistic and Neural Network-based classifiers to evaluate the performance of embedding techniques such as VERSE, Word2Vec, and TransX over different classes of Wikidata for constructing Knowledge graphs.
Constructed a Page ranking system using Apache Solr to link the entities and relations in the mention-concept graph.

experience.title: Software Research Intern
experience.team: Police Department, State Government of Tamil Nadu
details: Led a team of 6 members in prototyping a Laser-LDR based time tracking system using automated python scripts with an accuracy up to 1 millisecond and performed wireless data transfer by utilizing Arduino and Xbee modules.
Received a grant of $1500 from Tamil Nadu Uniform Services Recruitment Board.

experience.title: Summer Research Fellow
details: Improved the image classification rate in CIPHAR-10 dataset by 14.3% by binarizing the weights and activation outputs of neural network using Stochastic descent and discretization processes employing Shift based AdaMax rule

projects.title: Song Clustering using Locality sensitive hashing
details: Performed K-Medoids songs clustering using Locality sensitive hashing as the distance metrics.
Employed Map-Reduce technique to process millions of songs and cluster them based on lyrics similarity.
Gained insights regarding the relationship among song attributes like lyrics, genre, year released and artists.

projects.title: Product Search using eBay API
details: Designed a Website and Android App for E-commerce through eBay APIs
Incorporated features like filtered search, auto-completion, animations, Googleâ€™s custom search, Facebook sharing.

projects.title: Computation service using gRPC
details: Engineered a Computation service comprising of several micro services that communicated using gRPC APIs such as Unary, Server streaming, Client streaming, Bidirectional streaming.
Leveraged features like Interceptors, SSL Security, Error Codes, gRPC Reflections and Deadlines in the service.

projects.title: Car Routing using Reinforcement learning
details: Implemented a Car routing algorithm using Markov Decision processes like Value iteration and Policy iteration that predicted obstacle collisions by up to 87% accuracy.

projects.title: Resource Allocation using Adversarial Search algorithms
details: Optimally allocated resources to two contentious organizations based on a set of factors by mutating the Min-Max algorithm to maximize the utility value of the respective organizations.

projects.title: Text Classification using integrated Convolutional and Recurrent Neural Networks
details: Authored a thesis on designing an efficient DNN to effectively integrate Convolutional neural networks and Gated Recurrent Units which surpassed the precision of existing DNN by 7% for classifying text documents.
Raised DNNâ€™s accuracy by 5% through developing a new activation function - Inverse Exponential Linear Unit.

projects.title: Offline Internet using Intelligent Web Data Extraction
details: Built Android application to browse the web without any internet connection by using BoilerPipe Java Web API to collect web page content from the remote server.

projects.title: Intelligent Music Recommender System
details: Created a recommender system to suggest songs based on userâ€™s past choices and similarities among songs by applying collaborative filter machine learning algorithm and suggestions matched with userâ€™s preference by 87%.

projects.title: Dynamic Bus Tracking System based on Cloud Computing and Machine learning
details: Analyzed the traffic flow pattern of transit buses and formulated an algorithm based on K-nearest neighbours to predict the dynamic location of buses using cloud data and predictions were 82% accurate.

projects.title: Commuter Pass Automation System
details: Deployed a Web portal and Android app to automate the registration/renewal of commuter passes for transit buses.
